archimate:Requirement.name: Systems supports at least 15 characters in password length
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
1 The Tech Services' Password Policy contains a requirement regarding password complexity, where it's explicitly stated that the password length must be at least 15 characters long or at the system maximums. 2 The Password Policy states that its requirements must be met by any systems utilizing passwords.
This means that systems which do not support more than a 12-character length are not just in violation of the audit requirements; they're non-compliant with our company's Password Policy. By ensuring that all systems are compliant with our company's Password Policy, we will mitigate the password vulnerability.
